name: Dun Dun Dungeon
description:
Dun Dun Dungeon!

See it in action: 


It was supposed to be a VR rogue-like dungeon crawler, but we didn't quite get that far. You play as a robot ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ , you select some weapons (hard-coded as sword and crossbow in this version) and you smash your way underground, floor by floor, completing as many rooms as you can. 

We got hung up at the end with the transitioning between rooms, due to time constraints, there's just one room. 

Runs on PC VR headsets: Oculus Rift (or quest via the link cable/wireless), HTC Vive, or Valve index. Only tested on Rift, but the controls are generic enough to work with most headsets:

Controls:

  • Triggers: grab an object (or fire crossbow when equipped)
  • Grip buttons (hold): equip weapon (left hand crossbow, right hand sword)
  • Left thumb-stick directional movement (sorry no teleport)
  • Right thumb-stick left/right: Turn in 45 degree increments
